# GitHub Collaboration

This folder contains collaboration templates used by this repository.

## Contents
- `ISSUE_TEMPLATE/` — issue templates for decisions and work items.
- `PULL_REQUEST_TEMPLATE.md` — required PR checklist and governance checks.
- `workflows/roadmap-ci.yml` — validates semantic roadmap model and generated roadmap projection.

Use these templates to keep layer impact, governance implications, and decision-log updates consistent.
